title: Uprising Turned Revolution, VR For Babies (Shouldn’t Exist) 10.06.22
itunes:title: Uprising Turned Revolution, VR For Babies (Shouldn’t Exist) 10.06.22
description:
In episode 1346, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian, Madison Shepard, to discuss... The Uprisings in Iran Aren’t Just About the Morality Police, Walmart Built a Creepy VR Toy Store and more!

  1. The Uprisings in Iran Aren’t Just About the Morality Police
  2. Interview with PARANDEH: In Iran, Mass Protests Are Chanting “No Mullahs, No Shah, Just Democracy”
  3. Walmart Built A Creepy VR Toy Store
  4. Walmart enters the metaverse with Roblox experiences aimed at younger shoppers
  5. Toy Commercials Are Being Replaced by Something More Nefarious
  6. Inside bizarre Walmart in the metaverse aiming to draw in ‘young users’ with ‘free toys’
  7. Kids and the Metaverse: What Parents, Policy Makers, and Companies Need to Know
  8. ‘This is creating more loneliness’: The metaverse could be a serious problem for kids, experts say

LISTEN: Calabria by Rune

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
